channel.title: How to run more than one server at a time!?
channel.description: ok look im halping a great friend of mine he has awesome servers but nevermind about that ok look he has 3 servers HDserver 508 server and the agilnal server ok i need a guide on how we could run atleast 2 the hd and the aignal server together with out having the error port all ready in use so i seen a guide for this along time ago on her now i cant find it could some one pleasepost on here and help me get the anser please :)

item.title: How to run more than one server at a time!?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:5, topic:247748”][quote author=ry60003333 link=topic=326761.msg2561584#msg2561584 date=1228173740]
You can run a server on any port you want. I have three worlds for my server, however I have a login server controlling all of them.
[/quote]
Make tut or sdfu lul[/quote]
I was actually thinking of releasing a stable base that connected back to me for account loading/saving and the friends list, and then people would edit it and run it as their server. Then, people could take their account to lots of different servers, and keep track of their friends no matter what server they were on.

I could still do this, I just don’t think I have the time.

Read full topic

43594

change that to whatever port you want to run it on

ONLY USE 5555 AND 43595
